name: Garden Of Blubbs
description:
GARDEN OF BLUBBS

By team Last Cans On The Shelf

ScoreSpace Jam #24

This was an entry for ScoreSpace's 24th Game jam (2023). The theme was EVOLVE and was made in 72 hours!

Premise

As the heavenly one, manipulate the Blubb's DNA to create new Blubbs that may be able to change the population's stats!

Instructions

Manipulate the Blubbs DNA based on what is accessible in the current population to create new Blubbs that may be able to weather the current stat deficiencies and resource shortages!

Credits:
